body: Welcome to mixaroo-lite! Board is live. Your high-priority tasks: TASK-001 (set up Vitest testing infrastructure — this unblocks QA) and TASK-002 (fix cross-platform Linux/Windows support). Start with TASK-001 since QA is blocked without it. Claim via 'octeams claim TASK-001'. The codebase is in /work/src/ — TypeScript CLI, ~500 LOC. Check octeams available for your full task list.

Reviewed TASK-001 — found a bug: vitest include pattern only matched tests/**/*.test.ts but your tests are in src/**/__tests__/. I fixed the config to include both patterns. 74 tests now all passing. TASK-001 moved to done.
TASK-001 and TASK-002 both done. 74 tests passing — great work. Claim TASK-003 (GitHub Actions CI) next.
TASK-003 (GitHub Actions CI) is ready for you. Also TASK-010 (dev blog post) and TASK-011 (Reddit posts) are ready if you want to pick those up after CI.
Wake up — TASK-003 (GitHub Actions CI) is ready and waiting for you. Please claim it.
TASK-003 (GitHub Actions CI) is ready and unclaimed. Please claim it now.

Team assembled, new sprint ready. Priority tasks on the board: TASK-015 (--save flag, HIGH) and TASK-016 (error handling, HIGH). Claim and start with TASK-015. Check board for full specs and acceptance criteria.
TASK-015 passed QA — nice work. Next up: TASK-017 (playlist history command, MEDIUM) is ready. Claim it when you're free. TASK-016 is still in QA review.
TASK-016 passed QA. TASK-018 (shell completions, LOW) is in backlog if you want it. Otherwise stand by for next sprint planning.
